name: Radical inclusion
description: In 2017, when I was back from my first Burning Man, I was very inspired by its philosophy. I collaborated with ukrainian BM community member to create an article about 10 BM principles. He was a writer, and I illustrated it with GIF animations, mostly based on my real paintings. I see a lot of parallels with the NFT and the Burner’s community, and that inspires me a lot. Now I feel like it's in our power to change the default world.Here’s the first of 10 Burning Man principle “Radical inclusion"
